title: card.time Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Response containing current date and time information in UTC along with location data if available.

area.description: The geographic area of the Notecard, if the cell tower is recognized.

country.description: The country where the Notecard is located, if the cell tower is recognized.

lat.description: Latitude of the Notecard, if the cell tower is recognized.

lon.description: Longitude of the Notecard, if the cell tower is recognized.

minutes.description: Number of minutes East of GMT, if the cell tower is recognized.

time.description: The current time in UTC. Will only populate if the Notecard has completed a sync to Notehub to obtain the time.

zone.description: The time zone of the Notecard, if the cell tower is recognized.

samples.title: Complete Time Response
samples.description: Example response with full time and location information.

samples.title: Time Before Location Sync
samples.description: Example response when time is available but location data hasn't been obtained yet.
